name: Fused copy
description:
A puzzlescript game about removing fused blocks but pushing a block creates a new one. 

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=1c6aecf7772a69b1f88e189f7e55e5d0

Source code:https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=1c6aecf7772a69b1f88e189f7e55e5d0

This is a remix of 'Fused pieces' mechanics: rosden.itch.io/fused-pieces

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
